description.narrative: The project aims at enabling emerging and developing countries to actively contribute to the international market ramp-up of sustainable electricity-based fuels and feedstock (PtX). For demand markets (e.g. aviation and shipping, heavy freight transport, chemical industry), sustainability standards are addressed and recommendations for political decision-making are developed. In addition, the project cooperates with partner countries of the BMU in order to integrate PtX into long-term climate strategies, to develop the national market and to generate added value in the home country via export. For this purpose, the project cooperates with the financial and private sector. Finally, the International PtX Hub publishes knowledge products (e.g. studies, digital tools, technology and market radar), develops and conducts trainings and workshops, and pro-motes networks, partnerships and initiatives.
